Package interactive

Contains functionality for interactive board handling, which is independent of the graphical user interface.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutorouteSettings
    Contains the interactive settings for the autorouter.
    BatchAutorouterThread
    Thread for the batch autorouter.
    BoardHandling
    Central connection class between the graphical user interface and the board database.
    CircleConstructionState
    Interactive creation of a circle obstacle
    ClearanceViolations
    To display the clearance violations between items on the screen.
    CopyItemState
    Interactive copying of items.
    CornerItemConstructionState
    Common class for constructing an obstacle with a polygonal shape.
    CutoutRouteState
    CutoutRouteState class.
    DragItemState
    Class for interactive dragging items with the mouse on a routing board
    DragMenuState
    Class implementing the different functionality in the drag menu
    DragState
    Class implementing functionality when the mouse is dragged on a routing board
    DynamicRouteState
    State for dynamic interactive routing, which is routing while moving the mouse pointer.
    ExpandTestState
    State for testing the expanding algorithm of the autorouter.
    HoleConstructionState
    Interactive cutting a hole into an obstacle shape
    InteractiveActionThread
    Used for running an interactive action in a seperate Thread, that can be stopped by the user.
    InteractiveState
    Common base class of all interaction states with the graphical interface
    Logfile
    Logfile to track the actions in the interactive board handling for automatic replay.
    LogfileScope
    Enumeration class defining scopes in a logfile, Each Object of the class must implement the read_scope method.
    MakeSpaceState
    Class for shoving items out of a region to make space to insert something else.
    MenuState
    Common base class for the main menus, which can be selected in the tool bar.
    MoveItemState
    MoveItemState class.
    NetIncompletes
    Creates the Incompletes (Ratsnest) of one net to display them on the screen.
    PinSwapState
    PinSwapState class.
    PolygonShapeConstructionState
    Interactive state for constructing an obstacle with a polygon shape.
    RatsNest
    Creates all Incompletes (Ratsnest) to display them on the screen
    RatsNest.AirLine
    Describes a single incomplete connection of the ratsnest.
    Route
    Functionality for interactive routing.
    RouteMenuState
    Class implementing the different functionality in the route menu, especially the different behaviour of the mouse button 1.
    RouteState
    Interactive routing state.
    ScreenMessages
    Text fields to display messages on the screen.
    SelectedItemState
    Class implementing actions on the currently selected items.
    SelectItemsInRegionState
    Interactive state for selecting all items in a rectangle.
    SelectMenuState
    Class implementing the different functionality in the select menu, especially the different behaviour of the mouse button 1.
    SelectRegionState
    Common base class for interactive selection of a rectangle.
    Settings
    Contains the values of the interactive settings of the board handling.
    SnapShot
    Snapshot of the client situation in an interactive session.
    SnapShot.Attributes
    Defines the data of the snapshot selected for restoring.
    StitchRouteState
    State for interactive routing by adding corners with the left mouse button.
    TileConstructionState
    Class for interactive construction of a tile shaped obstacle
    ZoomRegionState
    Class for interactive zooming to a rectangle.

Package interactive Description

Contains functionality for interactive board handling, which is independent of the graphical user interface.
